title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Proficiency Improvement Project Through Online Inquiry-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and proficiency at the beginner language learner level
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze language-related problems and propose solutions using a 6-stage inquiry learning model.
Learners can complete three or more language projects through collaborative interactions with peer learners in a mobile LMS environment.
Learners can improve language expression and communication skills by 20% or more using H5P content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
